content: just got back to NYC, the skyline’s buzzing right out my new window. can’t wait to jump back into trading with some dope ideas i picked up on my travels. ready to reboot my career in this city that never sleeps.
raw_content: Back in the bustling heart of NYC! The skyline's electric, even from my new apartment's window. Excited to dive into the trading scene again, especially now that I've got some fresh ideas from my travels. Time to reboot my career in this city that never sleeps.

content: just turned 22, and the city's vibe is unreal. had a rough year, but losing my job? it's like a fresh start. gonna dive into AI trading and make a comeback. here's to new beginnings!
raw_content: The city's energy is contagious. Turned 22 today, and it feels like a reset button. Reflecting on my journey, the ups and downs, especially losing my job. But it's also a chance to learn from past mistakes and come back stronger. AI trading, here I come.

content: finally got my trading setup just right. feeling that spark again, ngl. hit up some old friends and met some cool people at a quant meetup. networking is where it's at
raw_content: Just finished setting up my trading station. It's been a while since I've felt this motivated. Been reaching out to old contacts and made some new ones at a local quant meetup. Networking is key.

content: just started coding a basic ai model for market prediction. it's super simple rn, but i'm kinda excited about it. also had a convo with my mentor about risk management. definitely seems like my next big focus
raw_content: Started coding a basic AI model for market prediction. It's rudimentary, but it's my baby. Also, had a deep conversation with my mentor about risk management. Seems like my next big focus.
